department: agence canadienne d'inspection des aliments, travail publics et services gouvernementaux canada
short_summary: purchase laboratory and scientific equipment (biological growth Chambers)
description: this request is reserved for holders of supply arrangement # e60pv-19equi only for the purchase of laboratory and scientific equipment,parts and accessories, services and supplies. only suppliers currently pre-qualified on supply arrangement e60pv-19equi have been invited to bid. as a requirement of the supply arrangement, this notice is published on buy and sell canada for a period of 40 calendar days. the closing date published on this notice identifies how long the notice will be published. for the closing date of any solicitation under the supplyarrangement, invited suppliers should refer to the solicitation documents. suppliers that do not have a supply arrangement for the supply of laboratory and scientific equipment, parts and accessories, services and supplies with public works and government services canada, cannot submit a bid. any bids received from suppliers notpre-qualified on the supply arrangement will not be evaluated.",
full_summary:
====================================

**Title and Reference Number**
---------------------------

* **Growth Chambers**: This solicitation is for the purchase of laboratory and scientific equipment, parts and accessories, services and supplies from bidders pre-qualified under Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI.
* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01005048

**Solicitation Details**
------------------------

* **Request for Proposal (RFP)**: 2023-00123
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-10-03T14:00:00
* **Publication Date**: 2022-08-23

**Eligibility and Requirements**
-------------------------------

* Only bidders currently pre-qualified under Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI are eligible to submit a bid for this solicitation.
* Suppliers may qualify under Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI for the supply of laboratory and scientific equipment, parts and accessories, services and supplies at any time.
* Interested suppliers should download the solicitation document E60PV-19EQUI/C from Buyandsell.gc.ca and submit a response as per the requirements of the Request for Supply Arrangement.

**Requirement Details**
-----------------------

* The Canadian Food Inspection Agency - Charlottetown Laboratory has a requirement for four (4) biological growth chambers.
* Suppliers must submit a bid in accordance with the requirements outlined in the solicitation document.

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

* This solicitation is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

* Contracting Entity: Canadian Food Inspection Agency
* Contact Name: Virginia Githua
* Contact Email: virginia.githua@inspection.gc.ca
* Contact Phone: (343) 575-4182

**Attachments**
----------------

* The solicitation document is available for download at the following URL: 
    https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/23/63024abff8bbcfdb4648d65b32017f6c/2023-00123_-_growth_chambers_-_npp-en.pdf
    https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/23/6d1e4e55856d8eb6b12a84eda737e89b
